author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
Ever wonder why you can’t recall memories from your early years? Turns out, your brain rewires itself so fast it erases your earliest memories – and that’s a good thing.

#kurzgesagt
#inanutshell #kurzgesagt_inanutshell #learnwithshorts #science #pov #earlychildhoodeducation #earlychildhood #earlydevelopment
